original_title: Jillian Michaels: Hot Body Healthy Mommy
overview: Jillian Michaels Hot Body, Healthy Mommy is the perfect workout DVD for getting your body back after having a baby.  When your doctor has cleared you for exercise and you're ready to get back into fitness, you will get fantastic results with this DVD.
title: Jillian Michaels: Hot Body Healthy Mommy
